'''Warm Essence''' is an item that can be traded in the Event Shop of "[[The Chalk Prince and the Dragon]]".

==Acquisition==
Obtain {{Item|Warm Essence|30}} through the '''Draconic Pilgrimage''' challenge. [[File:The Chalk Prince and the Dragon Draconic Pilgrimage Icon.png|45px|alt=Draconic Pilgrimage icon]]
